title: Companion Approval Guide
content: ill Area, follow the sound of a screaming Deep Gnome. From the main entrance of the Village coming from the Druid Grove. Simply follow the main road till you see the Windmill Let Fezzerk go when he surrenders Requirements/Details: For this encounter to happen, you need to make Fezzerk surrender. That will require to kill at least one goblin that is not Fezzerk and getting Fezzerk to below 30% without killing him. (Be careful with high damage or just use non-lethal damage) None Shadowheart -Wyll
